summary: A researcher investigating a notorious serial killer who was hanged 20 years earlier seemingly becomes possessed by the long dead strangler.
cast: Boris Karloff|Jean Kent|Elizabeth Allan|Anthony Dawson|Vera Day|Tim Turner|Diane Aubrey|Max Brimmell|Leslie Perrins|Jessica Cairns|Dorothy Gordon|Desmond Roberts|Roy Russell|Derek Birch|Peggy Ann Clifford|John Fabian|Joan Elvin|Audrey Sykes|Michael Atkinson|Harry Brunning|Yvonne Buckingham|Jimmy Charters|Robert Day|Marie Devereux|Tex Fuller|Arthur Hall|Victor Harrington|John G. Heller|George Hirste|Anthony Lang|Arthur Mason|Arthur Mullard|Peter Perkins|Ernie Priest|Leonard Sharp|George Spence|Brian Sunners|Jeremy Young
title: El estrangulador fantasma
